title: Add Flowers Chain mini-game and enrich site content

requirements.text: Create a new dedicated Flowers Chain game experience as a patient-accessible route (e.g., `/game/flowers-chain`) and implement the interactive game in the frontend (no backend persistence required). The game must: (1) render a grid/board of flower tiles, (2) allow the user to create a chain by dragging or clicking adjacent matching flowers, (3) award points based on chain length, (4) provide clear start/restart controls, and (5) show an end condition (e.g., moves or timer) with a results screen.

quotes: Create flowers chain game for site and add content relevant and intresting

acceptanceCriteria: A new route exists for the game and is reachable in-app without requiring staff role.
The game board renders consistently on mobile and desktop.
Users can create a chain only by selecting adjacent tiles of the same flower type.
A score is visible during play and updates immediately when a valid chain is completed.
A restart/new game action resets the board and score.
The game includes a clear end condition and shows a results state with final score and a play-again option.

requirements.text: Update the Home page “Flowers Chain” promo card to navigate into the new Flowers Chain game route (instead of the current `/details/game` content-only screen), while keeping the other promo cards unchanged.

quotes: Create flowers chain game for site and add content relevant and intresting

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping the Flowers Chain promo card on Home opens the game route.
BetterHelp and Specialist promo cards still navigate to their existing details pages.
Navigation works on both desktop and mobile, including back navigation.

requirements.text: Add relevant, interesting, English-language content to complement the Flowers Chain experience. This must include: (1) a short “How to Play” section on the game screen, and (2) a small rotating set of calming, wellness-oriented micro-content related to flowers/relaxation (e.g., short facts or grounding prompts) displayed near the game (client-side rotation; no backend required).

quotes: Create flowers chain game for site and add content relevant and intresting

acceptanceCriteria: The Flowers Chain game page includes a readable “How to Play” section with clear instructions.
The page displays a set of short, relevant wellness/relaxation snippets that can change/rotate during play or between games.
All new user-facing text is in English and reads naturally.

requirements.text: Integrate optional calming audio controls on the Flowers Chain game page using a locally bundled audio file (play/pause and volume or mute). The game must remain fully usable if audio cannot autoplay or is unavailable.

quotes: Create flowers chain game for site and add content relevant and intresting

acceptanceCriteria: The game page includes play/pause control and a mute/volume control.
If the browser blocks autoplay, the UI still works and the user can start audio manually.
Audio is loaded from a static asset in the frontend (not from the backend).

requirements.text: Ensure all new game visuals (flower tiles and an optional soft background/banner for the game page) are added as static assets and used by the UI from `frontend/public/assets/generated` (do not proxy images through the backend).

quotes: Create flowers chain game for site and add content relevant and intresting

acceptanceCriteria: New required images exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and are referenced by the game UI.
The game UI does not require network calls to load its core visual assets.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (`backend/main.mo`); do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or the immutable hook paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not require third-party APIs, external databases, WebSockets, or external auth providers (Internet Identity only).
nonGoals: No multiplayer, leaderboards, or real-time shared play.
No backend storage of scores or game sessions (client-only is sufficient).

required: Set of 6 distinct flat flower tile icons on transparent background (flowers-tile-set.dim_512x512.png)
